content:
## NIT WARANGAL WI-FI CONNECTIVITY PROCEDURE
We have two Wi-Fi SSIDs in Campus network:
1. Provisioning
2. NITW

**Android Devices Connection Process:**

**Step 1:**
Install 'Clearpass Quick Connect' app from Google Play store. Grant necessary permissions after installation.

**Step 2:**
Connect to 'Provisioning' SSID. Click 'Sign in to WLan Network'. Use Campus mail-id. A password will pop up on your mobile.
*Note:* If 'Sign in to WLAN network' pop-up doesn't appear, open Google Chrome and visit: `https://aaa-1.nitw.ac.in/guest/Provisioning_Onboarding.php`
(Note: 'Provisioning' has a Capital P, 'Onboarding' has a Capital O).

**Step 3:**
Select 'I have already installed Quick Connect'. Download the network profile.
Open the downloaded file using 'QuickConnect'.
After clicking `quick1x.networkconfig`, it will successfully connect to NITW network and start provisioning.

**Final Step:**
After successfully completing the above process, connect to 'NITW' SSID only (not Provisioning).
This is a one-time process. Next time onwards, connect directly to 'NITW'.

## FACILITIES AND PROGRAMMES OF THE DEPARTMENT (Sports & Gym)

## Facilities Overview
The department has Indoor (fitness center/gym, wooden flooring for shuttle badminton) and outdoor sports facilities in almost all disciplines (400mtrs track, flood lit courts, stadium pavilion) except swimming pool.

## Programs & Competitions
The department will organize intramural competitions branch wise in all the disciplines to give an opportunity to involve more number of student community.
The department will provide an opportunity to talented sportsmen and women to participate in the extramural competitions like, Inter NIT sports meet and Inter University sports competitions regularly.
The department will organize sports tournaments at our campus regularly.
Fitness and Conditioning classes were conducted to all first year students regularly during academic year.

## List of Sports Events
The sports comprises of the following events:
* Athletics
* Cricket
* Kabaddi
* Basketball
* Volleyball
* Badminton
* Weight Lifting
* Best Physique
* Tennis
* Football
* Ball badminton
* Chess
* Table - Tennis
* Kho-Kho
* Tenni â€“ Koit
* Throwball

## Gym and Sports Timings
Timings: 5:00 am to 8.30 a.m. and 4:00 p.m. to 9.00 p.m.
Open to the students apart from office time.
